content: And I think what you'll see us do is four years now towards, -- yes, still looking at growth in the ACO, but having shown that there's a lot of appetite for this model, looking at the people who are participating in the ACO, looking at geographies more because now that we have a few quarters of data under our belt, we can see how CMS and CMMI are looking at geographic trends versus national trends and adjusting to the participants within the ACO with a mind towards the profitability of that particular program.
